roleset.name: cause to go down the throat
roleset.note: SWALLOW-V NOTES: VN classes gobble-39.3-2 and hiccup-40.1.1. (from swallow.01-v)

example.name: complicated tracing
example.text: ``Sit tight'' through the coming volatility, Mr. Reitman suggests, though he concedes that [many small investors]-2 will find Jaguar's zigzags ``too hard *trace-1* *trace-2* to swallow *trace-3*.''

example.name: poor John
example.text: John swallowed his pride and his chewing gum.
example.arg: his pride and his chewing gum

roleset.name: swallow completely
roleset.note: SWALLOW_UP-V NOTES: Roleset based on ON miss. Framed by Claire. (from swallow.02-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: They could swallow up the smaller fish in the pond and merge to form a few groups .
example.arg: the smaller fish in the pond
